BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/store-order/stage/order-item/"
TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/store-order/master/order/"
TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/order/store-order/master/order-item/"

TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_COLS = ["user_id", "line_item_id", "order_num", "transaction_ts", "loyalty_id", "upc_nbr", "pod_id",
                         "qty_sld_amt", "ext_sell_prc_amt", "item_coupon_savings", "item_rewardsprogram_savings","item_mvp_savings", "year", "month", "day"]
KEY_COL = ["order_num"]
PARTITION_COLS = ["year", "month", "day"]

logger.info(" \033[1m****************************************************************************** \n MDM - ORDER-ITEM - STORE_ORDER - ORDER_HISTORY - Starting with below parameters\n *****************************************************************************\033[0m")
logger.info("\n STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH))
logger.info("\n TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH))
logger.info("\n TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH))
logger.info("\n TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_COLS : {0}".format(TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_COLS))
logger.info("\n KEY_COL : {0}".format(KEY_COL))
logger.info("\n PARTITION_COLS : {0}".format(PARTITION_COLS))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def init():
    df_web_order_item = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH) \
        .select("user_id", "order_num", "transaction_ts", "loyalty_id", "year", "month", "day", f.explode(f.col("transaction_lines"))) \
        .withColumn("line_item_id",f.col("col.line_item_id")) \
        .withColumn("upc_nbr", f.col("col.upc_nbr")) \
        .withColumn("pod_id", f.col("col.pod_id")) \
        .withColumn("qty_sld_amt", f.col("col.qty_sld_amt")) \
        .withColumn("ext_sell_prc_amt", f.col("col.ext_sell_prc_amt")) \
        .withColumn("item_coupon_savings", f.col("col.item_coupon_savings")) \
        .withColumn("item_rewardsprogram_savings", f.col("col.item_rewardsprogram_savings")) \
        .withColumn("item_mvp_savings", f.col("col.item_mvp_savings")) \
        .dropDuplicates(["order_num", "line_item_id", "pod_id"]) \
        .select(TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_COLS)
    
    logger.info("init-load: Read orders from order container. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_web_order_item.count(),TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH))

    df_web_order_item \
       .repartition(5, KEY_COL) \
       .sort(KEY_COL) \
       .write \
       .mode("overwrite") \
       .option("mergeSchema", "true") \
       .format("delta") \
       .partitionBy(PARTITION_COLS) \
       .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH)

    logger.info("init-load: Created order-item. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_web_order_item.count(),TARGET_ORDER_ITEM_PATH))

##############################
# MAIN STARTS HERE
##############################
if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH) == False):
    init()

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def apply_cdc():
    df_store_order_master = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_STORE_ORDER_PATH)

    df_store_order_stage = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH) \

    logger.info("cdc-load: Read delta orders from stage container. Count={0}, Path={1}".format(df_store_order_stage.count(),STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH))

    df_store_order_stage.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_store_order_stage")
    df_store_order_master.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_store_order_master")

    df_store_order_item_stage = spark \
        .sql(
            """
            SELECT m.*
            FROM tbl_store_order_stage s
            INNER JOIN tbl_store_order_master m
            ON s.year = m.year
            AND s.month = m.month
            AND s.day = m.day
            AND s.order_num = m.order_num
            """) \
        .select("user_id", "order_num", "transaction_ts", "loyalty_id", "year", "month", "day", f.explode(f.col("transaction_lines"))) \
        .withColumn("line_item_id",f.col("col.line_item_id")) \
        .withColumn("upc_nbr", f.col("col.upc_nbr")) \
        .withColumn("pod_id", f.col("col.pod_id")) \
        .withColumn("qty_sld_amt", f.col("col.qty_sld_amt")) \
        .withColumn("ext_sell_prc_amt", f.col("col.ext_sell_prc_amt")) \
        .withColumn("item_coupon_savings", f.col("col.item_coupon_savings")) \
        .withColumn("item_rewardsprogram_savings", f.col("col.item_rewardsprogram_savings")) \
        .withColumn("item_mvp_savings", f.col("col.item_mvp_savings")) \
        .dropDuplicates(["order_num", "line_item_id", "pod_id"]) \
        .select(TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_COLS)
                
    df_store_order_item_master = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH)
    
    logger.info("cdc-load: Built order-item-stg & order-item-mstr datasets. Stage={0}, Master={1}".format(df_store_order_item_stage.count(),df_store_order_item_master.count()))

    df_store_order_item_stage.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_store_order_item_stage")
    df_store_order_item_master.createOrReplaceTempView("tbl_store_order_item_master")

    spark.sql(
        """
        MERGE INTO tbl_store_order_item_master
        USING tbl_store_order_item_stage
        ON tbl_store_order_item_master.year = tbl_store_order_item_stage.year
        AND tbl_store_order_item_master.month = tbl_store_order_item_stage.month
        AND tbl_store_order_item_master.day = tbl_store_order_item_stage.day
        AND tbl_store_order_item_master.order_num = tbl_store_order_item_stage.order_num
        AND tbl_store_order_item_master.line_item_id = tbl_store_order_item_stage.line_item_id
        AND tbl_store_order_item_master.pod_id = tbl_store_order_item_stage.pod_id
        WHEN MATCHED THEN 
            UPDATE SET *
        WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
            INSERT *
        """
    )


if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH)):
    apply_cdc()
else:
    logger.info("cdc-load:No delta orders found at path = {0}".format(STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH)):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH, recurse = True)
    logger.info("cdc-load:Cleaned up delta data container = {0}".format(STAGE_STORE_ORDER_ITEM_PATH))
